X.i.6.F.2.p
.
Handling Requests in Which the Examination Provider Is Unable to Provide Required Examinations
When a VHA facility does not have the ability to complete a specific examination needed for an IDES claim, the MSC must
submit the examination request to the appropriate contract examination vendor
.
If the contract examination provider cancels (or directs cancellation of) the examination because contract support is not yet available in the participantâ€™s area, the MSC should contact their station Exam Liaison, who will coordinate with
VAVBAWAS/CO/Contract Examination Inquiries
for assistance.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Development and Examinations
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F
